CustomField.formula: IF(OR(RIGHT(Product_Code_Copy__c,7)="EXPRESS",RIGHT(Product_Code_Copy__c,12)="EXPRESS-12MO"), SBQQ__ListPrice__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c * SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c /12, IF(LEFT(Product_Code_Copy__c,3)="LIC",Suggested_Sales_Price__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c *SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c, Suggested_Sales_Price__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c))
CustomField.label: MSRP Less Default Discounts
